name: Simple Energy
description:
Simple Energy is A Simple Puzzle Action Game! You goal is to absorb other energy sources and get to exit on each of 30+ levels.Beat records and unlock new avatars to play with!

You can play it on PC(Windows) or Android,All files included in the package.

This is my first game ever released publicly! I appreciate any feedback(positive or negative) on my projects.If you want to support me financially - go to my youtube channel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJEyDrUSYWHx12RA6HdrgKA),where is a link to donate in description :) Hope you will enjoy my game,I put several month work in it!
